Caption: Sir C.V. Raman delivers the Convocation Address. On the dais , from the left; Dr. G. Stahl, Mr. T.R. Doss, Mr. T. Muthian (Director of Technical Education, Madras), Prof. S. Rajaraman, Prof. B. Sengupto, Sir C.V. Raman, and Dr. K.S.G. Doss
